scenario: You live in Manhattan (zip 10005) and are thinking of adding a new companion to your household. You're deciding between an Afghan Hound, Akita, and Azawakh and want a clear comparison of their size, temperament, exercise and grooming needs to help choose.
combined_task: Compare the three breeds to choose a suitable dog for your household, and find a nearby nail-trim groomer in zip 10005 and check their service price.
selected_subtasks: Find a dog groomer for nail trimming within 100 miles of zip code 10005 and check the detailed service prices of the first one.
Compare the breeds Afghan Hound, Akita and Azawakh.
